Literature.Title: Investigation of the antimicrobial activities of Snakin-Z, a new cationic peptide derived from Zizyphus jujuba fruits.
Literature.Author: Daneshmand F, Zare-Zardini H, Ebrahimi L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli PTCC 2433(MIC=13.6µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae PTCC 4231(MIC=14.1µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=24.2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus PTCC 1442(MIC=28.8µg/ml),Aspergillus niger(MIC=9.3µg/ml),Candida albicans PTCC 4236(MIC=8.23µg/ml),Phomopsis azadirachtae PTCC 5027(MIC=7.65µg/ml),Pythium ultimum PTCC 5021(MIC=8.36µg/ml)
